page.title: 08FAMILY LIFE 1
page.content: We conducted a survey by sending a questionaire to families of children in each of the schools in our 4 times 3 km. block. We took a representative sample of families in council coalboard, and private housing. These are our findings. Most families are born and bred in Barnsley. Most visit their relatives at least once a week. Many families own or rent a video so they only go to the cinema to see films like "Star Wars" or "E.T.". On average each family visits the cinema twice in one year. Other occasional treats are eating out, picnics and a day at the sea-side. Several times a month most families go on car rides or country walks. Many couples hardly ever go out without the children but those that do go to a pub or working men's club. (cont. next p.)
